item.title: Twitch Streaming
item.description: Twitch Live Stream Chat https://dashboard.twitch.tv/popout/u/<username>/stream-manager/chat?uuid=2 /* Twitch chat browsersource CSS for OBS Just set the URL as https://www.twitch.tv/%%TWITCHCHANNEL%%/chat?popout=true And paste this entire file into the CSS box Original by twitch.tv/starvingpoet modified by github.com/Bluscream General Settings */ body { color: #FFFFFF!important; margin: 0 auto!important; overflow: hidden!important; text-shadow: -1px -1px 1px #000000, -1px 1px 1px #000000, 1px -1px 1px #000000, 1px 1px 1px #000000!important; } html, body, .room-selector, .room-selector__header, .twilight-minimal-root, .tw-root--theme-light, .popout-chat-page, .chat-room, .tw-c-background-alt, .chat-container, .ember-chat-container { background: rgba(0,0,0,0)!
